channel.title: The new safe computer (sample version, it's not complete yet)
channel.description:
For best use please use a monitor that is 1024 by 768 pixels
If this has ANY errors please tell me and i will be glad to try and fix them. Oh and this is PC only recommended.
This is the new version of one of my complete failures. I have re-done it to be alot better than the last one. Instead of just visible and invisible functions i have created a better way for doing things and i have celled my own new function that works with java, i understand the stuff may look really crappy, but untill i can get a good adobe photoshop artist to help me it will stay that way.
here is the dl http://uppit.com/v/SH2LGNFG
and then the pic [img]http://img40.imageshack.us/img40/9554/1348600489afa931.jpg[/img]

item.title: The new safe computer (sample version, it's not complete yet)
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:16, topic:310133”][quote author=Javafire link=topic=406565.msg3004132#msg3004132 date=1256245995]
bogus? whats so bogus about my software?
[/quote]

That it fails, if someone wanted real Privacy protection they’d just download McAfee or buy norton something that actually works.[/quote]

loooool go jump off a bridge you twat
mcafee+norton = fail unless you can afford a decent 600$+ laptop/desktop(800+ usually) that can run fast enough to not make your computer slow as shit.

i have mcafee, how many virus’ have i had to manually remove myself? probably 8:10 of virus’ i get McAfee can’t detect/remove and Norton failed so hard i uninstalled it and smashed it on my door b.c it’s the slowest constant “running updates” piece of shit ever.
He created something, you didn’t, go cry somewhere else. please.

Read full topic
item.source: The new safe computer (sample version, it's not complete yet)

item.title: The new safe computer (sample version, it's not complete yet)
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:26, topic:310133”][quote author=Explisionist link=topic=406565.msg3004150#msg3004150 date=1256246409]

bogus? whats so bogus about my software?

That it fails, if someone wanted real Privacy protection they’d just download McAfee or buy norton something that actually works.

thats not what this is about. it’s for keeping people away from your computer. and limiting access to those who want to use it.

Javafire, do not pay attention to Scape-JAVA, he think’s he is a big dog on these forum’s. Just ignore him and if he keeps flaming, and or spamming report it.

Besides it’s not bad you just need more artwork done.
[/quote]

Lol your a wannabe mod.[/quote]
lol you’re a flat out wannabe. now before you get one of us banned SHUT THE HELL UP.

Read full topic

That it fails, if someone wanted real Privacy protection they’d just download McAfee or buy norton something that actually works.
[/quote]

Leave this topic, your unwanted, and your action’s will bite your ass sooner or later.

[quote author=B2300 T4nk link=topic=406565.msg3004139#msg3004139 date=1256246159]

[quote author=Explisionist link=topic=406565.msg3004135#msg3004135 date=1256246064]

uh, wtf? you gotta problem with me or somethin?

it’s basicly for privacy purposes and protecting your computer from unwanted users

Such as… you?

[/quote] Its the way of msps forums. Live with it.

How about you leave and take your friend Scape with you. Just because this is Moparscape does not mean you can flame anyone you want. Keep doing it and you will end up like the rest.

Ontopic: It’s okay I suppose…
[/quote] I did not flame.

Mouthing == Flaming.

End of discussion…[/quote] If you dont like it get out of this topic.
